content:
Am I correct in thinking slicing validation was added on the latest HAPI release?
We're currently investigation this error:
Issue 1: ERROR - Patient.name
Problem evaluating slicing expression for element in profile
https://fhir.hl7.org.uk/STU3/StructureDefinition/CareConnect-Patient-1
path Patient.name (fhirPath = true and (use memberOf
'http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/name-use')): null

Also getting this error which says not:
Issue 2: INFORMATION - Patient
Profile
https://fhir.hl7.org.uk/STU3/StructureDefinition/CareConnect-Patient-1,
Element 'Patient.name[official]'': Unable to check minimum required (1)
due to lack of slicing validation
